short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds more functions for desktop Youtube shorts reel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YT Shorts Improved offers enhancements to the YouTube shorts viewing experience by allowing users of this extension to tap into features such as:

- AutoPlay
- Seek slider bar
- One click copy button
- Configurable shortcut key for copying shorts url (default: ctrl + x)
- Volume, Pause, Playback speed sliders and buttons



Thank you for taking the time to browse and use my extension, feedback is appreciated!
